title: Clay Matthews, Patriots, Jon Gruden, & Jimmy Garoppolo
itunes:title: Clay Matthews, Patriots, Jon Gruden, & Jimmy Garoppolo
description:
Colin discusses why the NFL isn't getting "soft" and that Green Bay Packers LB Clay Matthews needs to stop complaining, why the New England Patriots are losing, the friction between Oakland Raiders HC Jon Gruden and the front office, and why San Francisco 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo's injury was his fault. Guests include Michael Vick, John Middlekauff, Trent Dilfer, and Chris Mannix.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
